column2: The time has come to shatter the taboo of slavery! Lead the way, and other Remnants of the Fifth Nation will follow!

Under the Marquess of the Eastern Sea, the Fifth Nation was more than a few banded raiders -- it was organized, and it had true strength. If we are determined to restore our former glory, we must first rebuild the structure that led to that glory in the first place.

Legalizing slavery is one of the first steps to restoring the Fifth Nation.
